content: आनुमानिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [ अनुमानादागतः ठक्] {@--1@} Relating to a conclusion. {@--2@} Derived from an inference, subject to inference, inferential. {@--3@} Inferred. --कं The Pradhāna of the Sāṃkhyas; आनुमानिकमप्येकेषामिति चेन्न <ls>Br. Sūt.</ls>; °त्वं the state of being inferable.
